pages.text: The $(l)Farmer$() is a machine focused in crop farming, and it also supports enhancement upgrades.$(br)Note that it requires some items for it to function: (put them in the 2x2 square)

$(l)Seeds:$() if present will be planted in the farmer's range. Note that it will try to match a crop and its seeds so you can use multiple crops.$(br2)$(l)Bone meal:$() if present, will fertilize any crops possible within range.
